Articles.Content: no idea lol i just model
Where do we put the source files for the electricity mod? or any mod for that matter
You don't put the source files anywhere. It's only if you were interested in the workings of the plugin. Not required for any of the mods.
Ok, also how do I active the dragon's rcs and landing engines?
Wait nevermind Figured it out
good job. ten chars needed

I downloaded this, and it is awesome. I was able to land on the Mun in the first attempt using a rocket i built. However I cannot figure out how to put the kermins inside the capsule so i can do evas. I know normally that you see the three kernams (or in this case seven) on the bottom right of your screen, but i do not see them upon launch. Is there something that i need to do that i missed.

If someone could help, that would be great.

Uh the Kerbals aren't shown at the Picture thing at the right, down.

Is there an IVA Model for that Capsule?

Uh the Kerbals aren't shown at the Picture thing at the right, down.

Is there an IVA Model for that Capsule?

No there isn't. You need to edit the cfg like this:


INTERNAL
{
  //name = DragonGuts
  name = PodCockpit

}

Yes. mech jeb is not on kerbal net thus I cannot make it a required mod.

Actually, MechJeb is on Kerbal Net. I checked it today.

Can I edit the part config? Just asking.
Any plan to release a version not dependent on plugins?
cool pod

>Exovian

Why? I took the effort to make an animation part module for this and cBBp used MuMech to make the RCS drain correctly and the engines also use RCS fuel to make it simpler.
Haven't used this yet in my own designs but does look sharp ingame.
Could you please put the download back up?

Could you please put the download back up?

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/dragon-spacecraft-18-2/

Thanks I forgot I could download it from the spaceport. I feel kind of stupid now...

Will this be updated to .20?

No there isn't.

Yes there is. It should be in the download... it definitely used to be, as I have it installed. It just doesn't have any textures. But all 7 Kerbins are in the right seats.
Hey all, questions maybe you guys can help.... First how do i add attachment points to the inside of the trunk?
This pod is awesome, just miss extending landing struts pressing 'g' and maybe turning on flood lights with 'u', anyone know how to make it persistant for the pod?

Erm- is there a version with an interior texture yet? I don't mean to be a jerk but the flat white somehow is a bit jarring. XD

Erm- is there a version with an interior texture yet? I don't mean to be a jerk but the flat white somehow is a bit jarring. XD

I don't believe so, unfortunately--it's a great little mod, but CBBP has moved on to bigger and better things (KOSMOS I imagine).

I don't believe so, unfortunately--it's a great little mod, but CBBP has moved on to bigger and better things (KOSMOS I imagine).
